# Lessons learnt

## Product strategy & marketing

- Products built by engineers for engineers
- Tech blog ðŸ¡’ works...to some degree
- Don't be afraid from 180 degree direction changes

::: {.notes}
- Comprehensive solutions from infrastructure management to application deployments

## Go to market

- US presence matters (aka. "Hungary? That's in South America, right?")
- Product market fit (aka. throw shit at the wall and see what sticks)
- _Pro tip:_ find design partners **soon**

::: {.notes}
- Have a presence in the Bay area (San Diego meetup: senki nem ismert minket)
:::

## Office & social life

- If you have an office: **use it!**
- Social life matters (especially over 10 people)
- Brownbag sessions (educate each other)

::: {.notes}
- Communicate, talk to each other (don't get isolated)
- Covid made things worse
:::

## Hiring

- We hired all available top talent
- We needed more ðŸ¡’ we hired people capable to **learn**

::: {.notes}
- Interview process aimed to evaluate that
- Homework assignment is still in use after ~5 years
:::
